item.title: Bayesian Network Exe01
item.description: Introduction AI Course Bayesian network excerice 01 resolution using enumeration method. C 国家政策 U 学校政策 W 工作压力 B 身体状况 D 过劳死 Scenarios 已知 : Exercise01 求 : 当 学校政策＝＝ True 而且 工作压力 == True 时, 过劳死的概率. Resolution Value T:0.95 means True case with probability 0.95 Probability of C is omitted as it is not related. Even include C, the result should be same. Enumeration list INDEX U W B D
